inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a tissue diagnosis of any of the following metastatic, well or moderately differentiated, slow growing neuroendocrine tumor
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Carcinoid tumors originating anywhere in the body including the gastrointestinal (GI) tract or bronchial tree
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease: Any primary and/or metastatic mass reproducibly measurable in one or two diameters by Response Evaluation Criteria In Solid Tumors (RECIST) parameters by CT scan or MRI scan.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have progressed on octreotide therapy (up to and including Sandostatin LAR-60 mg/month)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior chemotherapy with capecitabine or temozolomide
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has received therapy including field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide

exclusion.criterion: Hypersensitivity: Patients with a history of severe hypersensitivity reaction to capecitabine, 5-FU, temozolomide or DTIC will be excluded
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient's tumor is anaplastic astrocytoma, not a neuroendocrine tumor. Patient has received prior chemotherapy with temozolomide.
